briefTitle: Distinction Between Lung Cancer and Gynecological Cancers by Canine Scent Detection
officialTitle: Distinction Between Lung Cancer and Gynecological Cancers by Exhalation Analysis and Canine Scent Detection
conditions: Lung Cancer, Breast Cancer, Ovarian Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* histologically confirmed lung or breast or ovarian cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* other cancers
* previous medical intervention within the last 14 days before gathering of the breath sample
